segments.text: That sink overflow is disgusting; water everywhere on the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, drying dishes without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's filthy now, spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing kitchens get so messy like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse with their climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting, hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, but this is all so sloppy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they be careful instead of creating chaos?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a neat garden, but inside it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage and cookie theftâ€” what a combination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene turns my stomach with all the neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should clean this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the apron's probably getting wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR
